name: Spheres and Cubes
description: Hello there! To play you have to get as much keys as you can and you have to escape to the door. Easy right. Well you're wrong! There are cubes who want to attack you! You have to dodge the cubes and escape! Not so easy right! Anyways, good luck and have fun! Use left, right, up, and down arrow keys, and use A and D to look around! Also make sure to play in full screen!
